black.content: ______ got kicked out of the local Stitch and Bitch group for ______.
______, it's what Elizabeth Zimmerman would do.
I skipped the gauge swatch and now my _____ looks more like ______.
I started knitting so I would stop ______.
Indie-dyed yarns can have some crazy color names. Last week I bought a colorway called ______.
Why don't you just buy socks?

white: A hand knitted Bernie Sanders doll.
A skein of yarn knitting with a ball of people.
An intense game of yarn chicken.
Breaking up with someone to get out of holiday knitting.
Curing cancer with hand knit hats.
Explaining virgin wool to a group of 12 year old boys.
Hiding a yak in your apartment.
The paralyzing fear of a tiny moth.
